title: Thrust and Riposte
description: Rene Godard is bored. Teaching young Edmund how to fence could not be more dull, thanks to to Owen Tregarth, the lad's tutor and self-appointed guardian. When he decides to try to liven things up he gets more than he bargains for, including Tregarth breathing down his neck, the most impertinent valet he's ever met, and a wild ride of intrigue and danger that he could never have expected. Can he keep his wits about him long enough to win this fencing match? Find out in this delightful romp.
author: Julia Talbot
